opinion:
RECONSIDERATION DOCKET, 76 Ohio St.3d 1438 (1996) 667 N.E.2d 983-990Supreme Court of Ohio. 1996.
RECONSIDERATION DOCKET Wednesday, July 31, 1996 94-1645. State ex rel. Oliver v. Southeastern Erectors, Inc.Franklin County, No. 93APD04-597. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 26,665 N.E.2d 1108. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
PFEIFER, COOK and STRATTON, JJ., dissent.
94-2511. Roberts v. United States Fid. Guar. Co. ErieCounty, No. E-93-35. On motion for reconsideration or clarification by Roberts. Motion denied.
F.E. SWEENEY and PFEIFER, JJ., dissent.
On motion for reconsideration by U.S.F. G. Co. Motion denied.
PETREE and COOK, JJ., dissent.
CHARLES R. PETREE, J., of the Tenth Appellate District, sitting by assignment.
THOMAS J. GRADY, J., of the Second Appellate District, sitting for RESNICK, J.
95-1151. Fawn Lake Apts. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision. Board of Tax Appeals, No. 93-D-954. Reported at 75 Ohio St.3d 601, 665 N.E.2d 194. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
STRATTON, J., not participating.
95-1216. Lakefront Lines, Inc. v. Tracy. Board of Tax Appeals, Nos. 93-H-1125, 93-H-1126, 94-H-69, 94-H-70, 94-H-71 and 94-H-72. Reported at 75 Ohio St.3d 627, 665 N.E.2d 662. On amended motion for consideration. Motion denied.
STRATTON, J., not participating.
95-1253. Akzo Salt, Inc. v. Ohio Bur. of Emp. Serv. CuyahogaCounty, No. 67221. Reported at 75 Ohio St.3d 1223,665 N.E.2d 1131. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
PFEIFER and COOK, JJ., dissent.
96-269. Daloia v. Franciscan Health Sys. of Cent. Ohio, Inc.Franklin County, No. 95APE06-808. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1404,666 N.E.2d 565. On motion for reconsideration. Motion granted;sua sponte, discretionary appeal allowed.
MOYER, C.J., RESNICK and F.E. SWEENEY, JJ., dissent.Page 1439 96-328. State v. Johnson. Ross County, No. 94CA2004. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1405, 666 N.E.2d 566. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
COOK, J., dissents.
96-330. Cherovsky v. St. Luke's Hosp. of Cleveland. CuyahogaCounty, No. 68326. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1405,666 N.E.2d 566. On motion for reconsideration. Motion granted; sua sponte, discretionary appeal allowed.
COOK and STRATTON, JJ., dissent.
96-362. State Auto. Mut. Ins. Co. v. Willis. Miami County, No. 95CA40. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1409, 666 N.E.2d 569. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
STRATTON, J., not participating.
96-370. State v. Talani. Cuyahoga County, No. 68750. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1406, 666 N.E.2d 566. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
96-385. Natl. City Bank v. Mustric. Franklin County, No. 95APE06-805. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1409, 666 N.E.2d 569. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
96-414. Ryan v. Terra Vista Estates, Inc. Cuyahoga County, No. 68933. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1409, 666 N.E.2d 569. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
96-459. State v. Sherman. Mahoning County, No. 94 C.A. 86. Reported at 76 Ohio St.3d 1406, 666 N.E.2d 566. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
96-914. Lonberger v. Shiplevy. Allen County, No. 1-96-8. Reported at 75 Ohio St.3d 1521, 665 N.E.2d 1136. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
